She is hardworking and she helps her mother to meet their daily expenses. She applied for a youth loan of 30000 YER from AMB to buy incense, perfumes, and clothes for her business.

loans.use: to buy incense, perfumes, and clothes for her business.

loans.name: Adama

texts.en:
Meet 40-year-old Adama from Moriba town, Southern area in Bo. She is married with three children between the ages of 10 and 17 years. Her children are currently attending school. In 1998, Adama established her local food business. Business is the main thing her parent trained her to do. She works at the business every day and she walks four miles to her operation area. She says that the main challenge to her business is poor road network within her operation area.

Adama requires a loan in order to buy more gari, palm oil, and dry pepper. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to give her children a quality education. In the future, Adama plans to build a business structure. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more gari, palm oil, and dry pepper.

loans.name: Oscar Orlando

texts.es:
Oscar, tiene un taller de mecánica, tiene 29 años de edad, está casado y tiene un hijo, desde hace cinco años posee el negocio junto a dos empleados, este oficio lo aprendió con un tío y lo trabaja de lunes a viernes.
Actualmente necesita comprar herramientas para su trabajo, por eso solicita un préstamo con el que pueda tener llaves de diferentes medidas, las cuales utilizara para la reparación y mantenimiento de vehículos, esta compra le dará un aporte muy necesario para mejorar su servicio y obtener más ingresos. 
Su aspiración es fortalecer el negocio, ofrecer a su familia una mejor condición económica.
texts.en:
Oscar is 29 years old, he is married and he has a child. He owns a repair shop, an activity he has been engaged in for five years and where he employs two people. He has learned this job with one of his uncles and he works Mondays to Fridays.
He currently needs to buy tools for his activity, and he is therefore requesting a loan to buy different metric wrenches that he will use to repair and maintain vehicles. This purchase represents a necessary contribution to the improvement of his service, a consequence of which will be an income increase.
He aims at improving his activity and at granting better economic conditions to his family.

loans.use: To buy different metric wrenches.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 37 years old and lives with her husband and two children in their own house. She has a store where she sells basic necessities like bread, beans, rice, eggs, and other items. She has a lot of sales experience because she has had this business for two years, so she always makes good profits. 

The business is located in her home, which is in an area traveled by many people. This has meant many customers for her. Lucy is a very entrepreneurial woman with a great desire to improve her circumstances. Every day she dedicates herself completely to her work because she knows that this is the only way she will achieve success.

She also owns a motorcycle taxi; she has hired an employee to operate it.

Lucy would like to expand her retail business. In order to do so, she needs to make a new investment, which is why she is requesting a loan from Yehu in order to buy basic grains, candies, instant products, beverages, etc.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candies, instant products, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en:
Dorothy used her previous loan of 20,000 KES to buy seedlings for cabbages, kale, spinach and tomatoes. She got a lot of farm yield, which she sold and made a lot of profits. With the additional income, she was able to buy animal feed for her dairy cows.

She desires to practice large-scale farming in the future. She has requested a loan of 53,156.25 KES to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Biasha

texts.en:
Biasha is a nice person with a very good character who can get along well with anyone. She likes her work, and she wants to be successful and improve her family’s quality of life. She lives with her family in the town of Msambweni.

Biasha raises and sells chickens. She started her business eight years ago through her own initiative. Currently, her business is going very well, since she can keep up with her household and educational expenses. She needs a loan to invest in the construction of a larger chicken coop. She also wants to purchase more chicks and chicken feed. This will increase her profits considerably, and with time, she will improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to construct a larger chicken coop, and buy chicks and chicken feed.

loans.name: Frederic

texts.en:
Frederic is 39 years old. He is married with three children aged between 6 and 11. They all attend schools. 

He currently owns a boutique where he sells different items. With the loan, he would like to add more items such as rice, soaps and sugar for sale. 

The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more rice, soaps and sugar for sale.

loans.name: German Enrique

texts.es:
German Enrique tiene 35 años, Es casado tiene 2 hijos, vive con la esposa y los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es Integrante de la V.R.C. LUCHANDO POR UNA MISMA CAUSA, se encuentra ubicada en el en el Recinto La primavera, perteneciente al Canton Ventans, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

German Enrique se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz  y frejol gandúl. Las compras lo hace en Ventanas. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, urea, insecticidas y fertilizantes para los cultivos.  

Con el apoyo del crédito podra aumentar los cultivos. El sueño es culminer de construir la casa. Los desafíos a los que se enfrentas son las plagas orosco y el ratón. En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte y ver televisión.
texts.en:
German Enrique is 35, married, and has two children. He lives with his wife and children in Ventanas canton in De Los Rios province. He is a member of the "Luchando Por Una Misma Causa" communal bank, located in the rural settlement of La Primavera, which is part of Ventanas canton. 

The people in this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice. German Enrique is a farmer and grows corn, rice and pigeon peas. He makes his purchases in Ventanas. 

He is applying for the loan in order to buy agricultural supplies such as urea, insecticides, and fertilizers for his crops. With the help of the loan, he will be able to increase his crops. His dream is to finish building his house. The challenges that he faces are beetle pests and mice. In his free time, he likes to play sports and watch television.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies such as urea, insecticides and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Reina Admit

texts.es:
Reina, quiere incrementar sus ventas en esta época que hay mas demanda, aprovechara que en este tiempo el elote esta ha bajo precio, para seguir elaborando tamales, tambien comprara maíz, manteca, aceite, hojas, condimentos, entre otros productos para realizar la venta.
Ella manifiesta que su experiencia con el préstamo anterior le ayudo a mejorar sus ventas, con sus ingresos ha cubierto gastos de deuda, de salud, alimentacion, en el hogar, esta en una mejor condición, se siente bien con este apoyo de financiamiento.
texts.en:
Reina wants to increase her sales at this time of year when there is more demand. She will take advantage of the fact that at the moment, corn is available at a low price, in order to continue making tamales. She will also buy lard, cooking oil, leaves, condiments and other ingredients for running her business. 

She says that her experience with the previous loan helped her to improve sales. With her income she has covered expenses for debt repayment, health and food. Her household is in better circumstances, and she feels happy about this loan assistance.

loans.use: To buy corn, lard, cooking oil, leaves and condiments for making tamales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the fees to register her degree

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es:
El Sr. Marcelino de 48 años, vive en la ciudad de Itá, está casado con la señora Agripina con quien conforma una hermosa familia con 3 hijos.
 Don Marcelino es electricista hace 18 años, cuenta con su propio taller en su casa contando con muy buena clientela, en el cual los ayudan sus hermanos. Él aparte de ser electricista tiene cultivos variados en la cual realiza un monitoreo cada semana.
 El crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de repuestos para artículos electrónicos, ya que es estas las temporadas que con más trabajo cuenta y así poder tener en stock esos repuestos
texts.en:
Marcelino is 48 years old, and lives in the city of Itá with his wife, Agripina, and their three children. Marcelino has been working as an automobile electrician for 18 years. He has his own workshop and a consistent customer base, and his brothers help him in the shop. In addition to his auto shop, Marcelino also farms some parcels of land, and monitors his crops every week. 

Marcelino plans to use the support from this loan to purchase replacement car parts for working on his clients' vehicles. He hopes this investment will help him increase his replacement parts stock as well as the amount of work he can accomplish for his clients.

loans.use: to purchase replacement automobile parts.

loans.name: Frederick

texts.en:
Frederick is 41 years old and married with two children, ages three and fourteen years, and he takes care of six relatives. He sells various goods such as vegetables, sugar, rice and fruits. He has three years of experience in this work. 

Frederick has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various goods such as vegetables, sugar, rice and fruits to resell. He plans to use any profits generated from this loan to satisfy his family's basic needs and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to purchase various goods such as vegetables, sugar, rice and fruits to resell.

loans.name: Haidar

texts.en:
Haidar is from Iraq. He is 34 years old and has four children. He is the only provider for the family.

Haidar owns a shop for women’s clothing. He differentiated his business by adding cosmetics to the shop. He established his business in 2007 and he now has an employee. He built good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $1,500 loan to install a rolling shutter and an external ceiling. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to install a rolling shutter and an external ceiling.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, commercial maize, and sorghum seed.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, and commercial maize and sorghum seed.

loans.name: Bintu

texts.en:
This is 31-year-old Bintu town from Moriba town Southern area in Bo. She is married with three children between the ages of eight and 13 years.

Bintu runs a clothing business. She sells female dresses and waxed cotton. She has been running this business for four years. She works at the business seven days per week and 11 hours per day. She also earns income from small-scale farming in the village. She says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation.

Bintu has requested a loan in order to buy different kinds of clothing materials, such as female dress fabrics and waxed cotton. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and buy a plot of land. In the future, she plans to build a permanent residence. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of clothing materials.

loans.name: Samar

texts.en:
Samar is a 25-year-old single woman who has been working as a hairdresser for 9 years. In 2006, Samar opened her own beauty salon and is working hard to improve it, because it is her main source of income for living.

Samar is applying for a YOUTH LOAN, from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to fix the leakage in her salon and to buy a new hair rinsing sink. These things are necessary to make her work easier.

This is Samar's first loan cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower and she hopes that her future experience with Al Majmoua will be invested in introducing her customers to new beauty products to buy.

loans.use: to make the necessary repairs to the leakage in her salon and to buy a new sink for hair rinsing.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en: Marie is 53 years old. She sells different items in the boutique. With the loan, she wants to add more rice, sugar and sodas to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate the house.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and sodas to sell.

loans.name: Josepha

texts.en: Josepha, aged 37, is married and has three children. She sells beans and sorghum. With the loan, she will purchase more beans and sorghum to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more beans and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Ana Daisy

texts.es:
Ana, quiere solicitar un préstamo que le ayude en su granja de cerdos, adquiriendo cerdos pequeños para engordar y tenerlo listo para la comercialización, con este aporte esta nuevamente mejorando su capacidad.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le permitió realizar el cultivo, mejorar y ampliar la granja, sus condiciones económicas son mejores, teniendo más ingresos y viviendo mejor que antes.
texts.en: Ana wants to request a loan that will help her with her pig farm acquiring piglets to fatten up and get ready for sale; this infusion will once again improve her capacity.  She considers that the previous loan made it possible for her to do the planting, to improve and expand the farm and her economic conditions are better since she now has more income and is living better than she was before.

loans.use: to buy piglets.

loans.name: Hipolito

texts.es: El Sr. Hipolito tiene 69 años de edad, está casado con la Sra. Basilica de 49 años, posee un camión que utiliza como Linea de transporte de pasajeros hace más de 30 años, trabaja todos los días de 5 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde, tiene buena cantidad de pasajeros habituales quien son en su mayoría funcionarios del Hospital y familiares de enfermos internados, el préstamo que solicita es para la compra de cubiertas para su camión ya que desea renovarlas para mayor seguridad suya y la de sus pasajeros, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposa, quien tiene una peluquería y así ayudan con los gastos del día a día.
texts.en:
Hipolito is 69 years old and is married to Basilica who is 49 years old. He has a truck that he has used as a transport line for passengers for more than 30 years. 

He works everyday from 5am to 3pm. He has many regular passengers who are, for the most part, hospital workers and relatives of hospital patients.

He is asking for a loan to buy tires for his truck. He wants to replace them with new ones so he can ensure the safety of himself and his passengers . His wife, who works in a hairdressers, also helps out and so together they can cover the costs of everyday living.

loans.use: to buy truck tires

loans.name: Moises Elias

texts.es: Moisés de 23 años de edad vive junto a su familia, su esposa y sus hijos es muy trabajador ya que se esmera por brindarle un mejor futuro a sus pequeños. es muy conocido por sus vecinos por su forma de ser muy amable y responsable con cada actividad que realiza. Actualmente Moisés se dedica al cultivo de elote y ejote siendo esta su principal fuente de dinero ya que no cuenta con otro trabajo el vende lo que cosecha y guarda una parte para el consumo propio. Ya que es el único que trabaja en su hogar siente el deseo de incrementar mas su ganancia es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y comprar insumos básicos como: semillas. abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes u otros espera y confía en Dios que pronto la ayuda sea entregada y agradece a las personas de buen corazón se le da darán.
texts.en: Moises is 23 years old and lives with his family, his wife, and his children. He works hard because he wants to give his little ones a brighter future. He is well-known in his neighborhood for being kind and responsible in everything that he does. Moises is currently growing corn and green beans, which is his main source of income as he does not have another job. He sells what he grows and saves some of his produce for his own consumption. Since he is the sole breadwinner in his household, he wants to increase his profits, and that is why he came to INTEGRAL to request a loan to buy basic supplies such as seeds, manure, pesticides, fertilizers, etc. He trusts in God that the help will come soon, and he thanks the good-hearted people who will help him.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies such as seeds, manure, pesticides, fertilizers, etc. to grow and sell corn and green beans.

loans.name: Maria Sara

texts.es:
María, quiere fortalecer el negocio con mas capital para trabajar, comprara variedad de ropa para atender las demandas de los clientes, en blusas, faldas, pantalones, ropa interior, con lo que espera que su negocio estará mas preparado.
Ella ha tenido experiencia con creditos y considera que incremento el negocio, sus ganancias han sido más favorables, tiene una mejor calidad de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
María wants to build up her business with more working capital. She will buy a variety of clothing for serving the needs of her customers, such as blouses, skirts, pants, and underwear. With this, she hopes that her business will be better stocked. 

She has had experience with loans, and considers that she has increased her business. Her earnings have improved, and she and her family have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy blouses, skirts, pants and underwear.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 31 years old and is single. Her African clothes vending business is well-organized. Esther has ten years of experience in her business and she currently employs two people to help her. 

Esther has requested a loan from Kiva lenders, via Vision Finance Company, in order to purchase more African clothes for resale. With any profits generated, she will reinvest in her business and save for her future.

loans.use: to purchase more African clothes for resale.

loans.name: Natalia Maria

texts.es: Natalia tiene 20 años de edad, empezó a laborar a los 16 como edecán trabajo que desempeña en la actualidad, es estudiante de la carrera de relaciones internacionales y comercio exterior, sus padres la apoyan con el pago de la mensualidad de su universidad, está cursando su último año por lo que necesita pagar el curso de titulación para poder graduarse por eso ella solicita apoyo de crédito para pagar dicho curso que para ella es muy importante para el desarrollo de sus conocimientos adquiridos, agradece a Kiva por brindar apoyo a los jóvenes para lograr su profesión y que quieren salir adelante siendo profesionales y emprendedores.
texts.en: Natalia, 20, started working at the age of 16 as an assistant, a job she’s still doing.  She’s a student majoring in International Relations and Foreign Commerce.  Her parents help her with the monthly university fees.  She’s in the last year of course work and needs to pay her final fees in order to graduate and this is why she’s asking for a loan to pay said fees because this course is very important for her to develop in the knowledge she’s acquired.  She thanks Kiva for helping young people attain their professions who want to get ahead by being professionals and entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to pay her final course fees.

loans.name: Anibal Ramon

texts.es:
Anibal Ramón tiene 31 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo de 12 años de edad, vive en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos-
Es integrante da la VRC AVANZA sus miembros se dedican a la Agricultura todos viven en el Sector del Recinto Agua Frías, prácticamente se han criado en esa zona, se dedican a Labores agrícolas u pecuarias en su mayoría. 

Anibal Ramón se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, urea, líquido mata maleza, abonos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá seguir creciendo con los cultivos.   

Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y cumplir el sueño de viajar en avión.
 
El sueño es aumentar la producción para mejorar los ingresos.  En el tiempo libre le gusta cuidar los cultivos.
texts.en:
Anibal Ramón is 31 years old, he is single and he has a 12-year-old son. They live in Ventana, in the Los Ríos province.
He is a member of Avanza Community Bank, whose members are farmers and all live in the  Agua Frías community, where most of them grew up; the majority of them are farmers or livestock breeders.

Anibal Ramón is a farmer, and he plants corn; on top of this he also breeds chickens and pigs. He is requesting a loan to buy supplies, urea, weed killers and manure. Thanks to this loan his crops will keep on improving.

He will buy the supplies in the town of Ventanas. The challenges he had to fare are blight and succeeding in travelling by plane, thus making his biggest dream come true.

He aims at increasing his production to improve his income. In his free time he likes caring for his crops.

loans.use: To buy supplies, urea, weed killers and manure.

loans.name: Philima

texts.en:
Philima is 33 years old and married with one child who is five years old. He has been selling clothes and umbrellas for ten years and works every day from 9 am until 4 pm. He employs two people to help him. 

Philima has requested a loan from Kiva field partner Vision Finance Company in order to expand his business by buying more clothes and umbrellas to sell. He plans to reinvest in his business and save money for his future.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes and umbrellas to sell.

loans.name: Nicholas M.

texts.en:
Nicholas, age 45, is a loving father, with five children. He is married and lives at Gadnesville. His wife is a nursing aid. 

Nicholas has been running a medicine store in his community for the past six years where he helps save the lives of community members. He learned this field of medicine from a professional nursing school. He loves this profession because he helps to contribute to the well being of the community members. 

He has requested this loan to purchase more drugs  such as paracetamol, quinine, cough syrup, septrine, etc. His plans  are to  give
his children a better education and to open a clinic in the future, since his wife is also a nurses aid.

loans.use: to purchase more drugs such as paracetamol, quinine, cough syrup, septrine, etc.

loans.name: Mikheil

texts.en:
Mikheil is from Kareli district. He is 34 years old and lives with his wife and mother. Mikheil’s mother works at the local self-government institution and gets a monthly salary. Mikheil is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, he owns a plot of land where apple, wheat, haricots and onions are grown. He does all relevant agricultural works to ensure a good quality harvest. The harvested products are sold locally. Mikhei is very hard-working man, with a rich experience in his work.

He requested a loan to purchase boxes for apples, and cover the costs related to harvesting apples. Mikheil will pay for workers and will be able to keep the apples in boxes in proper time. This will make sure not to rot the products during winter season. Mikheil will sell apples after several months, when the price and demand are higher and this will significantly increase the family income. The increased profit will be used for improvement the family living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for workers and to purchase apple boxes.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, commercial maize, and sorghum seed.

loans.name: Annah

texts.en: Ann is a 53 year old married woman. She has five children with ages ranging from eight to 21 years. She describes herself to be determined woman. She operates a retail stall where she sells clothes. Her business is located at a potential market place and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the KES 41,500 loan to buy a water tank that will be used by her family members. Her business goal is to expand her business within five years. She hopes that, in the future, she will start a new business of selling water to her community. This is her fourth loan with SMEP DTM after a previous loan of KES 50,000; which she managed to pay successfully.

loans.use: to buy a water tank.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is 24 years old, married, and has four children. They live in a neighborhood in the town of Msambweni. She has a store where she sells food products (rice, beans, flour, cornmeal, sugar, soft drinks, and bread), as well as medicines and other grocery products. She started this business with money given by her husband and later used the profits to increase her inventory. 

Mwanamisi currently has an established customer base, which allows her to increase her sales and experience more demand for the products she offers. At the moment, she is requesting her first loan so that she can invest in the purchase of food products, medicines, and grocery products. Her dream is to increase her sales and her earnings so that she can grow financially, support her children’s education, and achieve a stable business.

loans.use: to purchase food products, medicines, and grocery products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a water tank.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 25 years old, married and blessed with one child who is one year of age. David operates a welding workshop and has been in operation for a period of four years, earning an income of KES 4,100.  

David his servicing his first loan of KES 20,000 with KADET LTD and intends to use this amount to purchase materials for the welding business.  The profits earned will be used to invest back into his business. He hopes to have a flourishing business.

loans.use: To purchase welding materials.

loans.name: Philomene

texts.en: Philomene is 28 years old. She sells sorghum and has been in the business for four years. With the loan, she plans to buy more sorghum for sale. The profits from the business will be used to renovate the house.

loans.use: to buy more sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en:
VESTINE is 30 years old and married with one children who is five years old. He has been selling clothes and umbrellas for ten years and works every day from 9 a.m. until 4 p.m. He employs two people to help him. 

VESTINE has requested a loan from Kiva field partner Vision Finance Company in order to expand his business by buying more clothes and umbrella to sell. He plans to reinvest in his business and save money for his future.

loans.use: to purchase more bedspreads to sell.

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en:
Sawsan is a 51-year-old divorced woman, a mother of 5 children. Her family is the only concern in her life, and she always aims to provide them with a better living. She is a tailor known by her good reputation and excellent customer service service, with 33 years of experience in this field. 

To increase her family's income, Sawsan also works as baby sitter, taking care of neighbors children at home. Sawsan has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to repair her house's rooftop to avoid water leakage before the winter season. Sawsan is really an ideal Palestinian mother, working to provide her children with the best living ever. Sawsan hopes to expand her business through increasing her tailoring machines and recruiting people to help her.

loans.use: to repair her house's rooftop to avoid water leakage before the winter season.

loans.name: Cornel

texts.en:
Cornel is a hairdresser who had previously requested a loan of 50,000 KES which she used to buy a blow drier and hair drier.  This helped her to serve her customers more conveniently.  She grew her clientele because of her good services.  

With the additional profits from her business, she opened a hairdressing training college.  She opened this training college with the aim of training more youths into the beauty industry.  She is now requesting 74,013.75 KES to add a student classroom.

loans.use: To add a classroom

loans.name: Philomena

texts.en:
Philomena is now 54 years old and living happily with her family. Her three children are 23, 20 and 14 years old. She sells clothing and has been in operation for a period of two years, getting an income of KES 15,000.  

She is servicing her fourth loan of KES. 50,000 from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loan successfully and wishes to use this amount to purchase more clothing for resale. 

She wishes to improve the living standards of her family and prosper in business.

loans.use: To purchase more clothing materials for resale

loans.name: Jeannette

texts.en: Jeannette is 28 years old. She is married and has three children. She sells rice and sugar. She would like to get a loan to add more rice and sugar for sale. The profits from the business will be saved.

loans.use: To buy more rice and sugar for sale.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is a 25-year-old married man. He has two children ranging from one year to three years. He describes himself as polite  and friendly. 

He operates a motorcycle with which he provides transportation. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located within an urban area, and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge as the poor road network. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase motorcycle spare parts. His business goal is to expand his business within five years. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
There are many people who wish to improve themselves, and one of them is this young lady. Through her efforts, she has managed to operate a currier service. She transports parcels and other mail. Thanks to her determination, her business is doing well.

She lives in a rental house. 

Fatuma is requesting this loan to open a new currier shop since demand for such services is high.

loans.use: to open a new currier shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase additional stock of clothes.

loans.name: Andrea Del Carmen

texts.es:
Andrea del Carmen tiene 40 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la V.R.C. LUCHANDO POR UNA MISMA CAUSA, se encuentra ubicada en el en el Recinto La primavera, perteneciente al Canton Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Andrea del Carmen se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, arroz, maíz además se dedica a la cría de gallinas. Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, insumos, urea, ranger, fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito podrá sembrar más semillas. El sueño es comprar terreno.

En el tiempo libre le gusta cosinar.
texts.en:
Andrea del Carmen is 40 years old, married and lives with her husband and their children in Ventanas canton in De Los Rios province. She is a member of the "Luchando Por La Misma Causa," communal bank, located in the rural settlement of La Primavera, which is part of Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank make their living from short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Andrea del Carmen is a farmer, growing corn, beans and rice. In addition, she raises chickens. She makes her purchases and sales in the city of Ventanas.

She is applying for the loan in order to buy seeds, agricultural supplies, urea, herbicide, and fertilizers for her crops. With the help of the loan she will be able to plant more seeds. Her dream is to buy land. In her free time, she likes to cook.

loans.use: To buy seeds, agricultural supplies, urea, herbicide, and fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es:
María, solicita un nuevo préstamo para invertir en el cultivo de granos básicos, comprándose abono y herbicidas, estos materiales son necesarios para que la siembra este protegida de las plagas y mejore la producción, acostumbra a aplicarlos, pues hasta el momento le han dado buenos resultados.
Con el préstamo anterior considera que ha logrado tener lo necesario para realizar sus actividades en el campo, sembrando con los insumos agrícolas, sus condiciones económicas en la familia está mejor.
texts.en:
María is applying for a new loan to invest in growing staple grains, by buying fertilizer and herbicides. These materials are necessary so that the crop is protected from pests and output improves. She usually applies them, as so far they have given her good results. 

With the previous loan, she feels she has managed to have which she needs for her farm work, planting with the agricultural inputs. Her family's financial situation is better.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his home.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
La Sra. Norma es indudablemente una persona valiente y trabajadora, ella dice que es una persona humilde, honrada, luchadora que ama a su esposo, ya que juntos trabajan en la fabricación de bloques, guía  y ama a sus hijos, no le importan trabajar, lo importante para ella es sacar adelante a su familia.

El crédito solicitado a Fodemi se lo empleara en la compra de cemento, chasqui, polvo gris y arena para la fabricación de bloques, ya que tienen mucha demanda en estos tiempos y es una oportunidad que no deben dejar pasar, ya que su producto es bueno y reconocido.

El sueño que la Sra Norma tiene es comprarse una bloquera industrial, y pueda triplicar la producción que tiene en estos momentos, esta consiente que cumplir su sueño es posible pero tiene que trabajar, y es por ello que todos los días se levanta agradeciendo a dios un día más de vida donde pueda trabajar para poder cumplir su sueño.
texts.en: Norma is without a doubt a brave, hardworking woman; she says she’s humble, honest and tenacious and that she loves her husband since they both work together manufacturing concrete blocks.  She guides and loves her children who don’t mind working.  What’s important for her is to move her family forward.  The loan she’s asked Fodemi for is to buy cement, volcanic pumice stone, gray powder and sand to manufacture concrete blocks since they are in high demand these days and it’s an opportunity not to be passed up since her product is good and well-known.  Norma’s dream is to buy an industrial block maker so she can triple her current production.  She’s aware that she can reach her dream but must work to do so which is why every day she gets up thanking God for one more day of life in which she can work to reach her dream.

loans.use: to buy brick-making supplies.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es:
Emilia es una mujer de 55 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ella tiene 5 hijos, a quienes ama y ha dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacarlos adelante, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; Emilia no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, ya que su familia era muy humilde, en sus ratos libres le gusta cuidar a sus nietos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Emilia trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y verduras, adicionalmente también vende productos de belleza, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañanas y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, Emilia se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Emilia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindad podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para abastecer su negocio, tales como arroz, azúcar, leche, aceite, menestras, golosinas, bebidas, entre otros; así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose, con el deseo de poder lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda, para así poder tener un lugar adecuado y seguro para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Emilia, 55, lives in the city of Nazca; she has five children who she loves and has focused all her attention on in order to move them forward.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person with a strong desire for self-improvement.  Emilia was unable to study a professional career because she had to go to work very young to help out her parents because her family is very humble.  She likes taking care of her grandchildren in her spare time and sometimes cooks a delicious “Lomo Saltado” to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Emilia works in her small business selling groceries and vegetables.  In addition, she also sells beauty products.  She works every day from very early in the morning and works for about 12 hours daily.  Emilia feels good working and believes she does well because of the kind way she treats her customers.

Emilia is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will be able to buy merchandise like rice, sugar, milk, oil, snacks, beverages, among others to stock her store and she will continue working and striving hoping to reach her greatest dream: to finish building her house to have a proper, safe place for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.es:
Don Claudio es una persona con muchas ganas de triunfar y ser una persona de éxito, él se define como una persona trabajadora, honesta y responsable, con fe de que todo le va a salir muy bien y que el trabajo es el único camino para lograr sus metas.

El crédito que Claudio solicito a Fodemi es para la compra de madera en tablones, pintura laca y pintura de colores, ya que su trabajo está siendo muy reconocido en su ciudad y cada vez le solicitan más muebles.

El sueño que Claudio tiene es tener un gran taller de carpintería donde se pueda fabricar todo tipo de muebles, y dar trabajo a su familia, seguir estudiando para lograr ser un artesano titulado y calificado.
texts.en: Claudio’s a person who very much wants to be successful and triumph in life.  He defines himself as a hardworking, honest, responsible person who is confident that he’ll do well and that work is the only path to reach his goals.  The loan Claudio has asked Fodemi for is to buy lumber in boards, lacquer paint and colored paint since his work is very well-known in his city and he’s constantly being asked for more furniture.  Claudio’s dream is to have a large carpentry shop where he can manufacture all types of furniture, provide work for his family and to continue studying to become a qualified, certified artisan.

loans.use: to buy lumber in boards, lacquer and paint in assorted colors.

loans.name: Solidaridad Group

texts.es: Dilcia tiene 29 años de edad, es miembro del Grupo Solidaridad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos, su esposo se dedica a la albañilería. Ella inicio su negocio desde hace dos años y se dedica a la venta de ropa interior, el cual surgió a la necesidad de tener un empleo ya que anteriormente a Dilcia la despidieron por lo que tuvo que buscar una fuente de ingreso para su hogar. Una de las dificultades que se le presentan es que no puede salir a vender a otras comunidades ya que no tiene una bicicleta ni carro y el medio de transporte público le resulta muy peligroso por los asaltantes. El préstamo que Dilcia solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de ropa interior. Con la ayuda de este préstamo ella podrá surtir su negocio con mercadería y así atraer más clientes. Su principal propósito es ver graduados a sus hijos, su mayor sueño es establecer su negocio en un local amplio y en la ciudad donde pueda ofrecer a sus clientes prendas de diferentes estilos.  Es el primer financiamiento que Dilcia solicita en FAMA y espera cancelar sus cuotas de forma puntual.
texts.en:
Dilcia is 29 years old and she is a member of Grupo Solidaridad [Solidarity Group]. She is married and has 2 children. Her husband is a builder. 

Dilcia started her business selling underwear two years ago. Her business arose from necessity: she was let go at the company where she worked and so she had to find a way of earning some money for her family. One the difficulties she is having is not being able to sell her products in other communities because she does not have a bike or a car and feels public transport is too dangerous due to armed attacks.

Dilicia needs the loan so she can invest in the purchase of more underwear. With the help of this loan she can buy more stock for her business and so attract more clients. Her main aim is to see her children graduate and her biggest dream is to find a spacious place in the city for her business where she can offer her cstomers a variety of styles of garments. 

This is the first time Dilicia has asked for a loan through FAMA and she hopes to pay her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy underwear

loans.name: Adrian Jesus

texts.es:
ADRIAN JESUS tiene 21 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con la mamá en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante da la VRC AVANZA sus miembros se dedican a la Agricultura todos viven en el Sector del Recinto Agua Frías, prácticamente se han criado en esa zona, se dedican a Labores agrícolas u pecuarias en su mayoría. 

ADRIAN JESUS se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz desde hace tiempo. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, insecticidas, urea, líquido mata maleza y pagar a los jornaleros.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes para las siembras. Las compras y las ventas las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos. 

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. El sueño es remodelar la casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta observar la producción.
texts.en:
Adrian Jesus is 21 years old, he is single and he has no children. He lives with his mother in Ventanas, in the Los Ríos province.

He is a member of Avanza Community Bank, whose members are farmers and all live in the Agua Frías community, where most of them grew up; the majority of them are farmers or livestock breeders.

Adrian Jesus is a farmer, and he has been planting corn and rice for a few years. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, insecticides, urea, weed killers and to pay daily laborers.

Thanks to this loan he will be able to buy fertilizers for his crops. He will buy the supplies and sell his products in the town of Ventanas, in the Los Ríos province.

The challenges he had to face are blight and bad climate. He dreams of remodeling his house. In his free time he likes monitoring his production.

loans.use: To buy seeds, insecticides, urea, weed killers and to pay daily laborers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and commercial maize and sorghum seeds.

loans.name: Bosco

texts.en: Bosco is 26 years old and single. He sells rice and sugar in a boutique that he has been running for three years. With the loan, he plans to add more quantities of rice and sugar in his store for sale. The profits from the business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more rice and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Cira Angelina

texts.es:
CIRA ANGELINA tiene 24 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene una hija, vive con la hija y con el esposo en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante da la VRC AVANZA sus miembros se dedican a la Agricultura todos viven en el Sector del Recinto Agua Frías, prácticamente se han criado en esa zona, se dedican a Labores agrícolas u pecuarias en su mayoría. 

CIRA ANGELINA  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, urea, líquido mata maleza, abonos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá seguir creciendo con los cultivos.  
 
Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Mocache. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. 
El sueño es terminar de construir la casa.  En el tiempo libre le gusta cuidar a la hija.
texts.en:
Cira Angelina is 24 years old, she live in a common-law marriage and she has a daughter, and they all live in the town of Ventanas, in the Los Ríos province.

She is a member of Avanza Community Bank, whose members are farmers and all live in the Agua Frías community, where most of them grew up; the majority of them are farmers or livestock breeders.

Cira Angelina is a farmer, planting corn, and she also breeds chickens and pigs. She is requesting a loan to buy supplies, urea, weed killers and manure. Thanks to this loan her crops will keep on improving.

She will buy the supplies in the town of Mocache. The challenges she has to face are blight and bad climate.

She dreams of finishing building her house. In her free time she likes caring for her daughter.

loans.use: To  buy supplies, urea, weed killers and manure.

loans.name: Yamama

texts.en:
Yamama is a 31-year-old divorced woman and the mother of one child. Yamama  faced hard times in her life since she got her  divorce.

She has worked selling clothes at home for four years, when her brother helped her to start her own business. Yamama is known for her affordable prices and excellent customer service.

To increase her income she has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua to buy a new collection for the winter season.

loans.use: to buy a new collection for the winter season.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is from Iraq. He is a youth client who is 23 years old, single and lives with three family members, two of whom are employed.

Ali owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents and snacks. He established his business in 2009, and now he has an employee. He's built good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $3,000 loan to paint the shop and increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to paint the shop and increase his inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and commercial maize and sorghum seed.

loans.name: Ereda

texts.en: Ereda is the mother of 8 children. Five of them attend school. She sells bananas and has been in the business for the past 7 years. With the loan, she wants to add more bananas for selling. The profits from the business will be used to provide food for the family.

loans.use: to buy more bananas for selling.

loans.name: Lider De Defensores Group

texts.es:
La Sra.Nilda es uno de los miembros del grupo Lider de Defensores

La Sra. Nilda tiene 55 años y tiene  06 hijos de los cuales solo 01 vive con ella y su esposo. Nilda tiene una bodega que está en su misma casa, en el negocio comparte labores con su hija que la ayuda durante las mañanas. Nilda se encarga de la bodega por las tardes después de volver de su otro trabajo en la municipalidad de su distrito, la bodega le permite ingresos para solventar algunos gastos de su familia y apoyar a su esposo, con el préstamo que  ha solicitado comprara productos de abarrotes  como arroz, azúcar, fideos y menestras. Con esta inversión espera mejorar su negocio y tener mas clientela para aumentar sus ingresos.
Nilda está muy agradecida a los inversores de KIVA por saber que la apoyaran en su negocio. En la foto aparece en medio del grupo viste  chompa negra y esta con el pelo recogido.
texts.en:
Nilda is one of the members of the "Lider de Defensores" group.

Nilda is 55 years old and has six children, of whom only one lives with her and her husband. Nilda has a small grocery store in her own home. In the store, she shares the work with her daughter, who helps her in the mornings. Nilda looks after the store in the afternoons, after returning from her other job with the municipal government of her district. 

The store allows her to have income for meeting some of her family's expenses and helping her husband. With the loan she has applied for, she will buy grocery products such as rice, sugar, noodles and pulses. With this investment, she hopes to improve her store and have more customers, so that she can increase her income. 

Nilda is very thankful to the Kiva investors, knowing that they will support her in her business. In the photo, she appears in the middle of the group, wearing a black sweater and with her hair pulled back.

loans.use: To buy grocery products.

loans.name: Compañeros De San Martin De Porres Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Peru! Este s el grupo Compañeros de San Martin De Porres

Zonia de 52 años vive con sus 03 hijos, su esposo y una nieta. Con el fin de apoyar con los ingresos familiares decidió empezar un negocio propio,  hace 20 años tiene una óptica donde vende variedad de productos como lentes de sol, anteojos a medida y lentes de contacto. Zonia trabaja en su tienda todos los días, en sus ratos libres dedica su tiempo  a vender productos de belleza que es un ingreso adicional, su meta es seguir mejorando su negocio y sus préstamos son importantes para ese propósito, en esta oportunidad lo utilizara en la compra de accesorios para lentes; espera seguir mejorando su óptica y así captar más clientela.
Zonia se siente feliz por saber que muchas personas de todo el mundo la apoyan en su negocio. Sobretodo los inversionistas por quienes está muy agradecida.

Zonia viste  chompa color turqueza.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru!  This is the “Compañeros de San Martin de Porres” group.

Zonia, 52, lives with her three children, her husband and a granddaughter.  Aiming at helping with family income, she decided to start a business of her own.  She’s had an optician’s shop for 20 years where she sells a variety of items like sunglasses, made-to-order eyeglasses and contact lenses.  

Sonia works in her store every day and in her free time sells beauty products which produce extra income.  Her goal is to continue improving her business and loans are important for this purpose.  On this occasion she will use it to buy accessories for eyeglasses.  

She hopes to continue improving her optician’s shop to win over more customers.  It makes Zonia happy to know that people from all over the world are supporting her in her business, especially the lenders she’s very grateful to.  Zonia’s wearing a turquoise sweater.

loans.use: to buy eyeglass accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and commercial maize and sorghum seed.

loans.name: Cesar Ernesto

texts.es:
Cesar es un hombre de 30 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia, Cesar se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta relajarse escuchando música y en algunas ocasiones como buen chinchano, cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Cesar trabaja como operario maquinista en una empresa textil de su ciudad, él trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Cesar se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de sus materiales de estudio, tales como libros, cuadernos, folletería, entre otros; de esta manera Cesar podrá seguir cursando su carrera satisfactoriamente, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para convertirse en un buen profesional y así desea poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
Cesar is 30 years old. He is unmarried and lives in the city of Chincha. He is a very friendly, enthusiastic, hardworking person who is determined to get ahead in life. Thanks to his hard work and his family's support, Cesar is currently studying for a degree in business administration. In his free time he likes to relax and listen to music. Sometimes, like a good citizen of Chincha, he cooks a delicious meal of carapulcra and sopa seca to share with his family.
On his own initiative, with great effort and dedication, Cesar works as a machine operator in a textile company in his city. He starts work every day very early in the morning and works up to eight hours. He enjoys his work and thinks it's going well because of his hard work and the friendly service he offers.
Cesar is very grateful to Kiva's lenders. Their help will allow him to buy materials for his studies such as books, notebooks, and papers. That way, he will be able to complete his degree and become a successful professional.

loans.use: to buy materials for his studies.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en: Catherine is a 28-year-old married woman. She has three children. She describes herself as humble, jovial and friendly. She operates a green grocery store where she sells fruits and vegetables. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located at a market, and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge as a shortage of fruits and vegetables to sell. She will use the 15,000 KES loan to buy fruits and vegetables to sell. Her business goal is to become a supplier of fruits and vegetables within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Scarleth Del Rosario

texts.es: Escarleth tiene la edad de 23 años, es casada tienen 1 hijo, no está trabajando actualmente, estudia la carrera de licenciatura en derecho que sus padres le ayudan a pagar los gastos universitario, ya está en la etapa final de su carrera lo que para ella es muy importante porque con su titulo podrá aspirar a un buen empleo para salir adelante y darle un buen futuro a su hijo, por eso Scarleth solicita apoyo de crédito para poder pagar su curso de titulación para culminar su carrera profesional que tanto esfuerzo le ha constado a sus padres.
texts.en:
Scarleth is 23 years old, married, and they have one son. Currently she is not working, as she is studying for a law degree. Her parents are helping her to pay for her university expenses.

Now she is in the final stage of her degree program. This is very important to her; because with her degree, she will be able to aspire to a good job, so that she can move forward in life, and provide a good future for her son. 

This is why Scarleth is applying for loan assistance, so that she can pay for her degree graduation course. This will enable her to finish her professional degree, which has cost her parents so much effort.

loans.use: To pay for her degree graduation course.

loans.name: Susana Maria

texts.es:
Susana es una mujer de 27 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con sus padres y su pequeño hijo de 2 años, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su pequeño, ya que ella es madre y padre para él, lamentablemente Susana no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Susana trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, ella vende salchipapas, hamburguesas, salchipollos y otros, ella se inicio vendiendo dulces de manera ambulatoria, gracias a su esfuerzo y a sus ahorros pudo comprarse un carrito sanguchero, el cual le sirve de mucho en su negocio, ella trabaja todos los días y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Susana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su local de ventas, así también podrá comprar mesas y sillas para acondicionar mejor su negocio; de esta manera Susana podrá seguir trabajando y brindando un mejor servicio a sus clientes, así pues ella se esforzará por salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia pollería y en un futuro no muy lejano desea ver a su pequeño convertido en un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Susana is a 27-year-old woman living in the city of Cañete, Imperial District, with her parents and little two-year-old son who she loves and is her reason to live.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who focuses all her efforts into moving her little boy forward since she’s both mother and father to him.  Unfortunately, Susana was unable to study a professional career because she had to go to work at a very young age to help her parents meet household expenses.

On her own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Susana works in her small business selling food.  She sells ‘salchipapas’ [fried potatoes with fried sausages], hamburgers, ‘salchipollo’ [fried potatoes with fried chicken] and others.  She started out selling candy from place to place and thanks to her efforts and her savings she was able to buy a small food cart that’s very useful for her business.  She works very day for about 8 hours and feels good doing her work; she believes she does well because of the tasty way she cooks and because of the gracious customer service she provides.

Susana is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help provided she will be able to do some improvements to her sales stand as well as to buy tables and chairs to furnish it better.  In this way, Susana will be able to continue working and providing better customer service and she will be able to strive to get ahead and reach her dream of having a chicken shop and in the not too distant future see her little one become a great professional.

loans.use: to make improvements to her food stall.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy snacks, sodas, and water to sell.

loans.name: Keren Elizabet

texts.es:
Keren es una mujer de24 años, vive en la ciudad de Chiclayo con su pequeña hija de 7 años, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su pequeña, ya que es madre y padre para ella; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Keren no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Contabilidad, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver dibujos animados con su pequeña y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de sus padres, Keren trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y pude hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, Keren se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Keren se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, tales como arroz, aceite, azúcar, leche, menestras, bebidas y otros artículos de primera necesidad; de esta manera Keren tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que poco a poco pueda lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Karen, 24, lives in the city of Chiclayo with her 7-year-old little girl who she loves and is her main reason for living.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who focuses all her efforts into moving her little girl forward since she’s both mother and father to her.  Unfortunately, due to the lack of economic resources and the need to work from an early age, Karen was unable to study Accounting but would very much have liked to do so.  In her free time she enjoys watching cartoons with her little girl and sometimes cooks a delicious “Arroz con Pollo” (Chicken with Rice) to share with her family.

On her own initiative, with much effort and dedication and with her parents’ support, Karen works in her small business selling groceries.  She works every day starting very early in the morning and can do so for about 10 hours.  Karen feels good doing her work and believes she does well because of the gracious customer service she provides.

Karen is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will be able to buy merchandise like rice, oil, sugar, milk, vegetables, beverages and other basic staples to stock her store.  In this way, Karen will have the store better stocked and thus be able to increase sales and income that will be very useful for her to gradually reach her great dream of having a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Tumaini Group

texts.en:
Margaret is a member of Tumaini Group in Lugari District.    She is pictured with 13 One Acre Fund farmers, 7 women and 6 men. Margaret is standing on the right with her hand raised. 

Margaret is a new One Acre Fund farmer and is excited for the 2013 Long Rains season.  She joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough food for the family and use increased profits to send her children to school.

Margaret thought her harvest last year was poor.  She hopes that as a One Acre Fund farmer she can have an excellent harvest. Her biggest concern is sending her children to school. She plans on using future profits from the harvest to support her children’s studies and save for the future. 

For the 2013 Long Rains season, Margaret’s group members will take input loans of ½ acre each.  In total, this group will receive input loans for use on 6.5 acres of land.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and commercial maize and sorghum seed.

loans.name: Chantal

texts.en: Chantal is aged 28. Her husband works with her in the business. They have currently established another new business of a bar. Chantal wants the loan for adding more sodas and beers for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: to buy more sodas and beers for sale.

loans.name: Al-Safa Group

texts.en: This group is called Al-Safa and consists of five women who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 190,000 YER from AMB. Amirh is a 25 year old, married woman with six children. She owns a home and is a housewife who intends on working hard. She is applying for a youth loan of 50,000 YER from AMB. She will use the loan to purchase construction supplies for her house. She hopes to improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase food stuff like cereals and wheat flour, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, commercial maize and sorghum seed.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 26 years old and describes herself as a calm, good-natured person who is very responsible regarding her work. Josephine lives with her husband but they have not yet been blessed with any children.

She works alone in her beauty salon. She has been working in this business for one year, which has allowed her to build-up a good customer base. Josephine is asking Yehu for a loan so that she can buy cosmetics and supplies for her beauty salon, such as dyes, nail-polish, and a dryer. This investment will help her to improve the presentation of her business and provide a better service to her customers. The customers will be very grateful, and in this way, she will be able to increase her income.

Josephine dreams of having a big beauty salon to help people who need employment opportunities, and to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Thaer

texts.en:
Thaer is from Iraq. He is a youth client, 28 years old, and he is married and has two children. He is the only provider for the family.

Thaer owns a small grocery store selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, detergents, and snacks. He established his business in 2011. He has built a good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $3,000 youth loan to install shutters on his shop and increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to install shutters on his shop and increase his inventory.

loans.name: Sabatu

texts.en:
This is 29-year-old Sabatu from Kandeh town Bo, in the southern area in Sierra Leone. She is married with three children between the ages of five and 12 years. Her children are going to school. She also has one of her parents living with her. 

To earn a living, Sabatu operates a palm oil business at Kandeh town market. She sells palm oil and gari, a grain made from cassava. She has been operating this business for five years. 

Sabatu works at the business six days a week, 10 hours per day. Before, she was a housewife, but her husband’s salary is not enough to take care of the home, so she started selling palm oil and gari to change her family’s living condition. 

Sabatu has requested a loan to buy more gallons of palm oil and gari. The extra income from this loan will allow her develop herself and family and pay school fees for her children. In the future, she would like to see her business develop into a big store level. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: to buy more gallons of palm oil and gari

loans.name: Eyad

texts.en:
Eyad is a 35-year-old man. He is married and is without children yet. Eyad is a schoolteacher who earns a low salary which is not enough to cover the family's need.

For the past ten years, Eyad has also been raising and selling sheep and sheep products. This has been a profitable project, but also needs more support to cover the cost.

Eyad is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing more sheep and expanding and improving the barn's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

Eyad is photographed inside the barn where he is raising sheep.

loans.use: to purchase more sheep and improve the barn's condition.

loans.name: Flomina

texts.en:
Flomina is a resident of Mombasa area of the Coast province, Kenya. She is married and has one child. Flomina owns a retail shop, a business that she has been running for ten years. Flomina began the business from a loan she obtained from a friend. In this shop, she sells baskets, mats, brooms etc.

She learnt about Milango from other clients and joined the institution with an aim of accessing credit to improve the operations of her business. Her main challenge is price fluctuations.

Flomina is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenya shillings to purchase papyrus for making baskets, mats, brooms etc to sell. The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to improve on the living standards. She aspires to own other centers and plan for her child’s education with much security.

loans.use: to purchase papyrus for making baskets, mats, brooms etc for sale.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 37 years old, married, and has three children, between the ages of five and 16 years old. Esther is commonly known for her business of selling clothes and has been in this business for about eight years. She keeps her business open from 8 am until 5 pm every day.

Esther needs to request a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company. With this loan, Esther will purchase different styles of clothes to sell in her business. With this profit from the loan, she will hopefully earn more profit. Which in turn will allow her to keep reinvesting for better financial stability and to pay for medical insurance.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Mariam is 29 years old. Together with her life partner and her children, they live in the town of Msambweni in a house they rent. 

She makes blouses, dresses, pants, and shirts, among others, all from her tailoring workshop. She has had this business for one and a half years, and it has given her a lot of experience in production, which allows her to obtain better earnings.  She is very well-known and already has many customers who prefer her because of the quality of her clothing, her good prices, and her excellent service.

Mariam is an active woman, dedicated to her work, with dreams of getting ahead. She is always on the lookout for new opportunities that will allow her to achieve success. Every day she gives her maximum effort because she knows that only in this way will she reach her objective.

Christmas and New Year festivals are around the corner, and she has many orders to fulfill. She needs the capital, and because of this, she is requesting a loan from Yehu that will allow her to purchase wholesale fabric, thread, needles, and zippers.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale fabric, thread, needles, and zippers.

loans.name: Nice Development Group

texts.en:
Jacenta is a single mother of four who is divorced from her husband. Jacenta is persevering and social.

To make ends meet, she started looking around for scrap because she did not have money to start any major business. So she would pick up used plastic materials, collect them together, and later take them to factories that manufacture plastics. With this, she would get paid and was able to take care of her family needs. She has even bought a small piece of land out of the proceeds from the scrap.

She will use this loan to buy more scrap (used bottles and old metals) from the local people. She dreams of building a house for herself and the children, so that she can use the money she now spends on rent to send her children to better schools,  Apparently they attend universal primary education.

loans.use: To buy recycled plastics and old metals

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi, age 23, describes herself as a happy, enterprising person who is, above all, working very hard to get her son ahead. Mwanamisi lives with her husband and son in the town of Msambweni, Coast province.

She has a small store in her home. It is her main source of income. At the moment, she has a good customer base, but she has a problem: she does not have a good variety of products, so her customers go elsewhere. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Yehu for the purchase of basic staples such as: rice, flour, beans, sugar, oil, etc, so that her customers will have a good variety to choose from. This investment will allow her to expand her customer base, increase her sales, and increase her income. This will help her to support her family.

Mwanamisi dreams of expanding a her retail shop to a bigger store.

loans.use: to purchase of basic staples to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Om-Bashir Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om-Bashir and consists of four ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 180000 YER.

Khadiga is 42 years old. She is a married woman and has five children who live in Sana`a, Yemen. She already has experience selling basic necessity products in a space that she fixed in her house. From this, she earns a small amount which is not enough for her family's sustenance. She applied for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy food items for resale. She wishes to keep improving her business to be able to obtain better earnings.

loans.use: to buy food items for resale.

loans.name: Virgen De Fátima Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de Mujeres, Virgen de Fátima, actualmente tiene 12 integrantes y se encuentran en el 5to. ciclo del programa y están trabajando arduamente por seguir creciendo.
Una de las historias es de la señora  Liberata de 56 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de comestibles, sin importar las condiciones del clima ella sale todas las tardes a recorrer su barrio con sus comestibles que ella misma prepara. Liberata se define como una persona muy trabajadora que desea seguir creciendo.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para hacer sus comestibles, como ser carne, jamón, queso, huevo, harina y demás.
texts.en: This group of women, Virgin of Fatima, has 12 members, are in the fifth cycle of the program, and are working arduously to keep growing.  One of the stories is that of Liberata.  She is 56 years old and makes a living selling groceries.  No matter the weather conditions, she goes out into her neighborhood to sell the products she prepares herself.  Liberata defines herself as a very hard worker who wishes to come out ahead.  She is seekings this loan to purchase the items so she can prepare her products like meat, ham, cheese, eggs, flour, and more.

loans.use: to purchase meat, ham, cheese, eggs, flour, and more.

loans.name: Firas

texts.en: Firas is a 22-year-old single man. A year ago, he opened his own mobile phone accessories shop. The shop is his major source of income. Firas is working on improving, developing and expanding his business as much as he can. He opened his business with a small loan he applied for from Kiva partner Al Majmoua and it was beneficial to him. Today, Firas is applying for a youth loan from Al Majmoua in order to buy newly released mobile phones accessories and prepaid cards. He is very happy with what he has achieved to date and hopes to continue improving and expanding his business capital as much as he can.

loans.use: to buy newly released mobile phones accessories and prepaid cards.

loans.name: Mujeres Reunidas Group

texts.es:
El comité lleva por nombre Mujeres Reunidas, han asumido el compromiso de mantener unido el grupo y trabajar juntas y ayudarse las unas a las otras para poder salir adelante. Actualmente se encuentran en el décimo tercer ciclo, integrada por 16 mujeres.
Anika es una de ellas, quien se dedica a la venta de leche y de queso, Anika cuenta que tiene muy buena clientela ya que siempre da muy buenos productos a sus clientes, y eso le hace de buena fama. Es una persona muy emprendedora, y tiene gran motivación por trabajar y salir adelante.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de leche, con lo que tendrá siempre un buen stock de sus productos y podrá seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
This committee is called "Mujeres Reunidas" ["Women Reunited"]. They have taken on the commitment to maintain the group united, to work together, and to help each other get ahead. The group is made up of 16 women, and they are currently in their thirteenth loan cycle. 

Anika is one of them, and she works selling milk and cheese. Anika reports that she has a very good customer base, since she always offers very good products to her customers, and this has given her a good reputation. She is a very enterprising person, and she is highly motivated to work and get ahead. 

She is requesting this loan to buy milk, and with this she will always have a good stock of her products and will be able to keep growing.

loans.use: to buy milk to sell.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is 35 years old and is married with three children between the ages of 7 and 16 years old. He sells various foods, such as beans, maize, sorghum, coffee, etc. This is his sixth year in this business. Richard has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various foods, such as beans, maize, sorghum, coffee etc. for resale. With the profits from the loan, he will be able to save for his future, to pay medical insurance, and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to purchase various foods, such as beans, maize, sorghum, coffee, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is 30 years old and is married with three children between the ages of 5 and 10 years old. Her business is well organized. Beatrice has a clothes selling business. She works from 8am until 5pm every day and has eight years of experience. Beatrice has requested a loan from Kiva lender Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more clothes to sell. With the profits from this loan, Beatrice will continue to pay her children's school fees and will reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Madeleine

texts.fr: Madeleine est une femme mariée de 52 ans et mère de 7 enfants dont le premier a 34 ans et le denrier 15 ans. Restauratrice depuis 05 ans, elle vend repas dans un coin de la ville. Femme batante et courageuse qui sponsorise ses enfants, elle sollicite le crédit pour acheter des matières premières (sac de riz, sac de haricot, 10 alvéoles d'oeufs, accessoires du breakfast)pour augmenter son niveau de stock qui est bas et afin d'acroitre son chiffre d'affaires ainsi que son profit. le profit dégargé sera utilisé pour réinvestir dans son activité et le reste pour satisfaire ses besoins de necessité et ceux de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Madeleine is a 52-year-old woman, married, and the mother of seven children.  Her oldest child is 34 years old and the youngest is 15.

She has been working in the restaurant business for five years, and she serves meals locally, in her town. Courageous and determined, she financially supports her children.

She is requesting a loan to buy some basic food supplies (bags of rice, bags of beans, 10 egg trays, breakfast goods).  This will allow her to boost her stock of goods, which is quite low, and to increase her turnover and profits.

Madeleine will reinvest her profits into her business and will use the rest of the money to meet her basic needs as well as those of her children.

loans.use: to buy basic food supplies (rice, beans, eggs etc.)

loans.name: Mwanzia

texts.en:
Mwanzia lives in the Mombasa area of Coast Province, Kenya.  He is married and has five children.  He sells horticultural produce (eg. tomatoes, onions, vegetables) and has been operating this business for twenty years.  He also earns salary from a tea tree business and rental shops.  Mwanzia learned of Milango through a friend with an aim of accessing credit to better his business operations.  The main challenge he faces is the scarcity of water.  

Mwanzia is applying for a loan of 31,450 Kenyan Shillings to buy more fruits and vegetables.  His extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to expand the business and to improve his livelihood.  His future plan, in five years, is to move to bigger income-generating activities.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
